FreeMASTER MQX IO Communication Driver 
================================================================================

This folder contains the MQX platform-dependent part of FreeMASTER serial 
communication driver. Please see the User Manual for more information about 
how to configure and use the driver.

Driver example and test applications available in <install_path>/examples folder.
